records.note_contesto: Violent unrest and fire in a hotspot, but no injuries reported.
records.evidenza_testuale: up to now no injuries have been reported.

records.location_details: Minors section of RIC Text removed - Operational Area
records.note_contesto: Riot in the minors section of RIC, but no injuries reported.
A Syrian male had a panic attack during fingerprinting and was transported to hospital.
records.evidenza_testuale: A Syrian male had a panic attack... The migrant was given immediate medical attention... quickly transported to hospital.

records.note_contesto: Fire in a temporary housing container in a hotspot, but no injuries reported.
records.evidenza_testuale: No persons were injured during the incident.

records.note_contesto: SAR operation for a rubber boat with 47 estimated people on board. 40 migrants were safely disembarked. No dead or injured reported, but a discrepancy exists between estimated and disembarked numbers.
records.evidenza_testuale: Dead persons: 0, Estimated people on board 47, Embarking 40 migrants to CPB and safely disembarked them
